GSD.description:
dm stats: add cond_resched when looping over entries

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.197 by commit f00597350210ac9458e7865b176b982dfb33d8c0. For more details please see the references link.
